tables.comment: Employees and roles that can access the pos.

tables.label: Shift Payment Summary
tables.comment: Aggregated totals per payment method for a shift.

tables.name: order_type
tables.label: Order Type
tables.comment: Supported pos order types and workflows.

tables.name: order_status

tables.name: order_stage

tables.comment: possible payment states for orders.

tables.comment: State machine for individual order lines.

tables.name: payment_method
tables.label: Payment Method
tables.comment: Configured payment methods offered by the venue.

tables.name: kitchen_section
tables.label: Kitchen Section
tables.comment: Production areas used for routing kitchen tickets.

tables.name: menu_category

tables.comment: Menu taxonomy categories.

tables.name: menu_item

tables.comment: Alternate price points for menu items (sizes, combos).

tables.name: menu_item_media

tables.comment: Rich media assets associated with menu items.

tables.name: menu_item_modifier

tables.name: customer_profile
tables.label: Customer Profile
tables.comment: Customers interacting with the pos.

tables.name: customer_address

tables.name: order_header
